name: Puzzlink
description:
If you like our Links Puzzle game, this fun and challenging puzzle game is everything you have ever wanted: a unique, simple, minimalist and smart game to spend your free time, challenge your friends and increase your IQ.

Puzzlink is an easy to learn puzzle game, but hard to beat. The dynamics of the game is a complete challenge for those who like logic games. Puzzlink also causes an effect similar to the Tetris Effect, so it increases our brain activity the more you play. Play this link puzzle only once, and then you won't be able to drop it.
